name: HAMRAAH FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Hamraah Foundation is registered under society registration act 1860. We have been working for the past nine years in the field of education, healthcare etc. and we are committed for human welfare in general. One of the workshops lately executed by us was based on “Science Communication Through Folk Media” for rag picking children in association with Vidhya Bharti Foundation, Ahmedabad held on 5th - 9th May 2012. Children were trained for puppet making, scripting, manipulating, dialogue delivery etc.
